    • Method Detail

      • connectToDatabase

        public static void connectToDatabase()
        Connects to the database and creates the table if necessary.

      • generatePathFilter

        public static Map<String,String> generatePathFilter(String path)
        Given path inputs, generates filters in a format standard across the entire project.
        example path parameters:
        dev1/fabric2
        example filter:
        {environment: "dev1", fabric: "fabric2"}
        Parameters:
        path - the path for which a filter is being generated
        Returns:
        the generated filter

      • generateSQLSet

        public static String generateSQLSet(Collection<String> collection,
                                    boolean full,
                                    boolean prepared)
        Given a Collection of Strings, generates a SQL-compatible set.
        Parameters:
        collection - a Collection of Strings
        full - true if the collection contains all the properties of the intended set, else false
        prepared - true if the collection is intended to be used in a prepared SQL statement as placeholders for values, else false
        Returns:
        the SQL-compatible set of properties

      • generateSQLFilter

        public static String generateSQLFilter(Map<String,String> filter,
                                       Set<String> keys)
        Generates a SQL command-style filter for a given Map and optional set of keys.
        example filter:
        {environment=RWC-Dev, fabric=hazelcast}
        generated filter:
        " WHERE (environment = 'RWC-Dev') AND (fabric = 'hazelcast')"
        example filter and set of keys:
        {environment=RWC-Dev, fabric=hazelcast}
        {'lfs/ingestion/large-file/chunk/size', 'lfs/ingestion/topics', 'report/kibana/version'}
        generated filter:
        " WHERE (environment = 'RWC-Dev') AND (fabric = 'hazelcast') AND (key IN ('lfs/ingestion/large-file/chunk/size', 'lfs/ingestion/topics', 'report/kibana/version'))"
        Parameters:
        filter - the filter, as a Map with String keys and values
        keys - an optional Set of keys for the IN operator
        Returns:
        a SQL command-style filter

      • getTable

        public static String getTable()
        Returns the name of the database table.
        Returns:
        the name of the database table

      • getSize

        public static long getSize()
        Returns the size of the properties table.
        Returns:
        the size of the properties table

      • getDistinct

        public static Set<String> getDistinct(String field,
                                      Map<String,String> filter)
        Gets all distinct instances of the specified field name.
        Parameters:
        field - the field name
        filter - the query filter
        Returns:
        a Set of all distinct instances of the field name

      • clear

        public static long clear()
        Clears all rows from the database table.
        Returns:
        the number of properties cleared from the database

      • select

        public static List<Map<String,String>> select(String sql)
        Extracts data from the database.
        Parameters:
        sql - the full SQLite command
        Returns:
        the extracted data as a List of Maps, each of which represent a single property, or row within the SQL table

      • insert

        public static void insert(Map<String,String> property)
        Inserts new data into a database.
        Parameters:
        property - a Map representing the property as a series of key-value pairs (e.g. "environment" : "RWC-Dev", "key" : "some key")

      • update

        public static void update(Map<String,String> updated,
                          Map<String,String> filter,
                          Set<String> keys)
        Updates data in a database.
        Parameters:
        updated - a Map of fields to be updated
        filter - a Map of fields with which to filter the updates
        keys - a Set containing the keys of each property to be updated

      • delete

        public static void delete(Map<String,String> filter)
        Deletes data from a database.
        Parameters:
        filter - a Map containing the filtered fields (e.g. environment, fabric)

      • insertBatch

        public static void insertBatch(Collection<Map<String,String>> properties)
        Batch inserts new data into a database. Significantly more efficient for groups of documents than individual insertion.
        Parameters:
        properties - a Collection of properties (represented by the standard Map)

      • deleteBatch

        public static void deleteBatch(Collection<Map<String,String>> filters)
        Batch deletes data from a database. Significantly more efficient for groups of documents than individual deletion.
        Parameters:
        filters - a Collection of filters (represented by the standard Map)
